alert.note: Alert for East Otter Tail; Grant; West Otter Tail (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 2:38PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Otter Tail and northwestern Grant Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 237 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dalton, or 7 miles southeast of Fergus Falls, moving north at 70 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fergus Falls, Pelican Rapids, Ottertail Lake, Lake Lida, Star Lake, Big McDonald Lake and Underwood. This includes Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 49 and 71. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on or near any lakes, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west central Minnesota.

area.areaDesc: East Otter Tail; Grant; West Otter Tail
